name: Alloy Spray
overview:
Established in the year of 2009, we, “Alloy Spray & Engineering”, have emerged as as a prominent organization engaged in rendering Coating Service, Thermal Spray Coating Service, Metallizing Service, Chemical Machinery Service, Tank & Vessel Coating Service and Heavy Fabrication Service.

Infrastructure: We have a spacious state-of-the art-infrastructure and one of the largest manufacturing units in the country equipped with latest machinery and other equipments. We strive to take care of people health at global level. We have a team of experienced professionals engaged in manufacturing of this products.

Our Team: It is largely due to unwavering support of our team, we have been able to attain specialization in this discipline. Being an integral part of the organization, our team leave no stone unturned to render the best-in-class and reliable Coating Service, Thermal Spray Coating Service, Metallizing Service, Chemical Machinery Service, Tank & Vessel Coating Service and Heavy Fabrication Service.

Our Quality: Providing reliable and effective Coating Service, Thermal Spray Coating Service, Metallizing Service, Chemical Machinery Service, Tank & Vessel Coating Service and Heavy Fabrication Service is one our core values. With the firm commitment towards quality, we ensure to render services as per the clients’ requirement.

Domain Expertise: We hold all the aces in rendering the best-in-class Coating Service, Thermal Spray Coating Service, Metallizing Service, Chemical Machinery Service, Tank & Vessel Coating Service and Heavy Fabrication Service. These services are being rendered by professional who hold expertise over their respective domain.

Client Satisfaction: We have made all our efforts dedicated towards acquiring utmost clients’ contentment. To meet expectations of the clients, we offer the most efficient Coating Service, Thermal Spray Coating Service, Metallizing Service, Chemical Machinery Service, Tank & Vessel Coating Service and Heavy Fabrication Service.
